narrative.challenge: Establish a canonical runtime version contract and CLI visibility as the first mature-deployment milestone.
narrative.build: Added package-level __version__ fallback logic, introduced telec version output with channel and commit, and bumped the project baseline to 1.0.0.
narrative.gauntlet: Build verification, review approval, and finalize-prepare completed before canonical apply on main.
narrative.numbers: Build report recorded 17 completed tasks, 1 build commit, full lint pass, and green test suite coverage for the change.
narrative.whats_next: Subsequent mature-deployment slugs can now rely on stable version introspection for channels, migrations, and auto-update behavior.
